content.html: A woman read one of my blogs about abusive misogynistic men and then left her vile husband. He emailed me giving me aggro, telling me it was all my fault she left his sorry ass and told me that I hoped I was proud of myself. I was. Still am.
content.value:
A woman read one of my blogs about abusive misogynistic men and then left her vile husband. 

He emailed me giving me aggro, telling me it was all my fault she left his sorry ass and told me that I hoped I was proud of myself. 

I was. Still am.
